title: Photoshop underwater effect. How?
content:
Are there any legit tutorials on how to achieve a very nice underwater effect on a photo. I want to make people/object look sunken. I found some very crummy tutorials through google. It’s not the look I’m going for.

I want to see the ocean bed above (perspective). And particles in the water. Possibly sun rays beaming through.

Thanks. Any help would be greatly appreciated!
author: coupdegrace

comments.content:
here’s one [tutorial](http://web.archive.org/web/20090918101742/http:/www.heathrowe.com/tuts/underwater.asp) ... maybe you found  
this one already.

You might have better success in a [photoshop forum](http://web.archive.org/web/20090918101742/http:/www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=%22photoshop+forum%22&btnG=Google+Search)  
than a type forum.

but you probably know that already. :D
